name: Castle Fireball Defense
description:
4 player Warlords clone for mobile/touch screen devices.

Shield your castle from the dragons fireball by tapping/clicking your castle to move the shield. If the fireball touches a brick it will destroy it. If the fireball touches you you will die.

Play online

You can only have one player if you use the mouse.

Use a touchscreen to play with up to 4 people at a time.
